name: Puzzler World 2012 3D
description:
Take on 16 different types of puzzles including classic favorites like Crosswords, Word Search and Spot the Difference plus eight all-new variations like Pathfinder, Takegaki and Suko. Additional bonus games unlock with progress, adding new layers of variety to the experience over time. With the introduction of 3D, Puzzler World 2012 3D promises hours of fun, wherever you are!

Features

- Play 16 fun puzzle variations
- Includes Crosswords, Hangman and Spot the Difference
- Learn new games like Takegaki and Suko.
- Fun for all ages and skill levels
